name: Empower Defense
description:
In this Nokia Jam #4 tower defense game, you play as an all-mighty head wizard whose kingdom has been invaded by magical slimes who have has purged the land of sound & visuals! You must use your magical currency gained from the slimes to summon your troops into battle against the gooey menace & restore the kingdom! Luckily, you have an old spellbook that lets you upgrade reality itself... should come in handy.

HOW TO PLAY: 

Place towers on non-path in order for the towers to damage the slimes, causing you to gain magical currency. Magical currency can be used to place more towers or purchase upgrades. 

There are two towers: Wizards & Knights. Wizards can cast spells in intermediate directions (southwest, northwest, etc.), while Knights can thrust their swords in cardinal directions (left, right, etc.). 

5 upgrades must be purchased in order to beat the game. In order, the upgrades cause:

  • Restoration of Knights' visuals
  • The ability to place Wizards
  • Sound effects
  • Music
  • Winning the game

CONTROLS

Move: WASD

Switch tower: Arrow Keys

Place tower: Space

Pull up/down menu: Enter

Delete tower: Backspace

Navigate menus: WASD & Space

CREDITS:
